pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Extent Tools // Functions to produce a fully fledged 'geo-spatial' object extent as a 'SpatialPolygonsDataFrame'. Also included are functions to generate polygons from raster data using 'quadmesh' techniques, a round number buffered extent, and general spatial-extent and 'raster-like' extent helpers missing from the originating packages. Some latitude- based tools for polar maps are included.
